meanings.definition: To surpass in glitter or sparkle.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks display was outglittering the stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Her sequined dress outglittered all the other outfits at the party.
meanings.sent3: The disco ball was outglittering the birthday cake, making it look dull.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight outglittered the dewdrops on the grass, creating a magical scene.
meanings.sent5: The princess's tiara outglittered all the jewels in the treasure chest.

meanings.definition: To outshine in brilliance or attractiveness.
meanings.sent1: The new diamond necklace was outglittering all the other jewelry in the store.
meanings.sent2: Her smile outglittered the stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was outglittering the kitten with its playful antics.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter outglittered the sound of the crashing waves on the shore.
meanings.sent5: The bright neon sign outglittered the dim streetlights, drawing everyone's attention.
